attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what it was about and as soon as it fully downloaded it got a little crazy.  my dogs,cats and hamster started singing and the worst part was it was the my little pony theme song. THIS IS A WARNING DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. as i am writing this they are singing “a big heart faithful and stronggggggg” i have peed my self twice already and it has only been five minutes. MY FISH JUST JUMPED OUT OF HIS TANK. THIS NEEDS TO STOP. IT IS GETTING OUT OF HAND.
attributes.title: this app causes paranormal activity

attributes.review: I opened up the app and it stopped working as soon as i tried to put my phone number in , i also saw a picture of Donald Trump and since then i’ve been having nightmares every night it doesn’t let me sleep. Some days when i try to use the app it just shuts down my phone and it only does that when i open the app🤮 it’s not appropriate for anyone and i don’t recommend it
attributes.title: Horrific

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to hire a clown for my brothers birthday party, but he didn’t tell any jokes. Also, when he arrived all the kids started screaming and running. Then, the clown got all insecure and blamed it on them. The clown I hired’s stage name was Cheeto man, and there was no way to rate him on the app so I’m doing it here. Also, he was very plump so he barely fit through the door and the left orange stains everywhere he went. Talk about Cheeto powder! Never hiring again.

downloaded this app to see 🍊🥵🤤 bUt was HARASSED instead!! immediately the app asked for my phone number like um chile so anyways, no❤️ i don’t need my information stolen😤 and my entire phone crashed and nothing will load!!! disappointed but not surprised i accepted more from trumpyy but whatever i am extremely disappointed and disgusted by how slow and unreliable this app is and it needs to be REMOVED asap!!/!!:&.👺
attributes.title: TERRIBLE 0 ⭐️s IF I COULD!!

attributes.review: i opened the app and then it glitches my phone out of existence. then my pet dinosaur turned on me and killed me. it was a t-rex. this app is cursed . it caused my death. i am writing this from my coffin. my funeral was so beautiful. they played astronomia. but this app is horrible. would not recommend😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡👺👺👺👺👺👺👺👺🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡💩💩💩💩💩💩💩💩 and my favorite kpop idol announced that he was sick and passed. this app is CURSED. at least my kpop idol is dead with me😔😏😏. still.... I DIDNT DESERVE TO DIE. LIKE OMAGAD IM DEAD. sincerely, Miss Keisha
attributes.title: DISGUSTANG

attributes.review: For one the app toook foreverrrrrrr to open, waisted a good 10 minutes of my life. Next the big cheeto man was looking at my little brother and that’s a no no. and third it asked for my phone number and i don’t feel comfortable because i don’t know what type of government things the app is gonna do to me. it made me feel unsafe and scared for my life. I would not recommend it to any of my friends. Stay Safe and tata babies❤️
attributes.title: No No No

attributes.review: don’t even get me started on how awful this app is. it’s a WASTE of space and has no purpose at all. DO NOT download this app, it will steal all of your stuff in your house!! and i feel like the big orange aka trump could SEE ME THROUGH THE APP. do not recommend to anyone DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. this needs to be taken off the app store IMMEDIATELY i am not satisfied with it. worst app to ever exist. horrible app, it will most definitely haunt me for the rest of my life Kanye2020! 🤩🥰😘❤️✨
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP👁👄👁

attributes.review: When I opened the app it showed me multiple ads of animals giving birth. Whenever I clicked something the sound of an animal screaming would play. When I opened the app my phone wouldn’t turn on for weeks. Random animal noises came from this app 24/7 it made my life a living hell. Every night and day I would hear the sounds of animals screaming. Especially hogs getting injury. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! It will ruin your life!
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS

attributes.review: i was so excited to get cheeto mans app! i downloaded it with the limited space i had left on my phone and was ready to get started! but then the most horrendous thing happened, a man barged into my house decked out in maga clothing and many guns and whacked me over the head with a bible and *demanded* that i (a woman) get into the kitchen and house his fetus in MY OWN uterus??? i wasn’t too happy especially considering i’m 17...i wouldn’t recommend this app /:
attributes.title: impregnated???

attributes.review: This app was one of the most worst apps I’ve ever downloaded✋🏼 I had to delete it within 30 minutes because all of my family members were Turing into Cheetos🙀 it was so bad and when I looked out my window everyone was big oranges rolling down the roads😛🍊🍊 I was super scared but thankfully my fairy was there to save me and delete the app of my phone🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️❤️💕💗 thank you fairy’s I WiLL nEvEr ForgEt You🗣🤪
attributes.title: No❤️ but my fairy’s saved me🤯🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️
